category.title: Temporary Compost Toilets
category.description: Reported sightings of temporary compost toilets. Compost toilets that have been erected for a specific event or a short period.

category.title: Sewage spill
category.description: Reported sightings of spilled sewage, causing environmental damage

category.title: Permanent Compost Toilets
category.description: Reported sightings of permanent compost toilets or compost toilets that have been built for a long (indefinite) period
